input.sentences: everyone is at the easter egg hunt .
kids are trying to find the hidden eggs .
it could take a while to find them all .
output.sentences: It was finally the day of the annual North Atlanta Easter Egg Hunt..
The children were organized by age.
When the first whistle blew, the youngest children began to run.
Dozens of eggs were visible on the ground there for the taking.
As each group finished their hunt, they were offered pony rides for free.
